data.title: Shelton Lower School
data.meta_description: School Ratings for Shelton Lower School, Lower Shelton Road, Marston Moretaine, Bedford, Beds, Bedfordshire, MK43 0LS. This school was rated Good by Ofsted in December 2016.
data.text:
Shelton Lower School is a primary education institution located in the U.K. specifically in Wolverton and Greenleys, Milton Keynes, with the postcode MK43 0LS. Some notable facts about the school include:

It serves children from the age of 4 up to 11, following the primary curriculum.

Shelton Lower School forms part of The Shelton School Academy Trust, which also includes Shelton Middle School and Shelton Preschool.

The school has been designated as a National Support School for other schools for its expertise in educational development.

In 2019, Shelton Lower School received a ministerial letter acknowledging its role in supporting other schools.

The school has a comprehensive, open, and welcoming approach, offering a wide range of learning opportunities to support every student's growth and development.

Some of the aspects that emphasize the school's dedication to education are its positive ethos, commitment to achieving high standards, diverse extra-curricular activities, and strong community partnerships.

For more detailed information, please visit the school's official website or contact the school directly.
